definition: to come down in the world (idiom)/to suffer a reversal of fortune

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: He is the son of the rich man , However look that the family financial situation was worsening .
sentences.chinese: 他是個富人的兒子，不過看上去已經家道中落了。

sentences.english: He is the son of a richman, but his family seems not doing well recently.
sentences.chinese: 他是個富人的兒子，不過看上去已經家道中落了。

sentences.english: He was the son of a wealthy man, but the family looks declining.
sentences.chinese: 他是個富人家的兒子，看上去已經家道中落了。

sentences.english: He is a son from a wealthy family. But it looks like his family's glory is fading away.
sentences.chinese: 他是個富人家的兒子，不過看上去已經家道中落了。

sentences.english: He is the son of a wealthy family, but he seems to have come down in the world.
sentences.chinese: 他是個富人家的兒子，不過看上去已經家道中落了。
